title: The Dead Shot
content: The Dead Shot Very Rare 3~10 Damage 1d8 +2 Piercing Improved Critical: The number you need to roll a Critical Hit while attacking is reduced by 1. This effect can stack. Keen Attack: The wielder doubles their Proficiency Bonus when rolling ranged attacks with this weapon, unless they have Disadvantage. Weapon Enchantment +2 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: When the archer Frederik Durlusk died, his only request was to be buried with his favourite bow. This is that bow. LongbowTwo-Hande
